tool.name: DTAExtractor
tool.description: Extracts spectra of an MS run file to several files in DTA format.
tool.command:
DTAExtractor
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out "$param_out" #end if #if $param_mz: -mz "$param_mz" #end if #if $param_rt: -rt "$param_rt" #end if #if $param_level: -level "$param_level" #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #end if > $param_stdout

param.name: param_out
param.label: base name of DTA output files (RT, m/z and extension are appended)

param.name: param_mz
param.label: m/z range of precursor peaks to extract
param.help:
(-mz)
This option is ignored for MS level 1

param.name: param_rt
param.label: retention time range of spectra to extract

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Extracts spectra of an MS run file to several files in DTA format.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_DTAExtractor.html
